name: Attaque
Garde
note:
Compétence #2 sera utilisée lorsque
vous sélectionnerez la commande Garde.

description:
Vous rentrez dans une danse folle de combat qui
continue même si l'ennemie meurt.
name: Blade Dance
note:
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets true
perform start
wait for movement
cast Animation 35: user
ani wait: 3
</setup action>
<target action>
camera focus: targetzoom: 120%30
wait for zoomopacity 
not focus: 0 60
wait for opacity
cast Animation 35: user
ani wait: 3
move user: targets, back, 5
wait for movement
face user: target
motion attack: user
action animation
ani wait: 2
action effect
move user: targets, front center, 5
face user: target
motion attack: user
ani wait: 3
action effect
move user: targets, back top, 5
face user: target
ani wait: 3
action effect
move user: targets, front, 5
face user: target
motion attack: user
ani wait: 3
action effect
move user: targets, back center, 5
face user: target
motion attack: user
ani wait: 5
action effect
move user: targets, front, 10
immortal: target, 
falsejump user: 200%, 10
face user: forward
wait for animation
wait for movement
</target action>
<follow action>zoom: 100%, 60opacity 
not focus: 100%, 60wait for opacity
</follow action>

description: Vous rentrez dans une danse folle de combat.
name: test
note:
<setup action>

display action

camera focus: user

zoom: 130%, 15

wait for zoom

</setup action>

 

<target action>

hide battle hud

opacity not focus: 0, 20

wait for opacity

MOVE user: target, front base, 10

wait for movement

motion thrust: user, no weapon

wait for movement

animation 1: target

animation wait: 1

motion dying: target

wait for movement

wait for animation

MOVE user: target, center, 1

jump user: 350%, 30

WAIT: 15

float user: 350%, 15

ADD STATE 34: user

wait for float

motion guard: user

animation 135: user

animation wait: 35

motion thrust: user, no weapon

float user: 0%, 10

wait: 5

animation 134: target

wait for animation

motion walk: user

MOVE user: target, front base, 1

REMOVE STATE 34: user

face user: forward

action effect

wait: 20

immortal: target, false

Wait 30

reset camera

reset zoom

move user: home, 5

face user: forward

wait for movement

</target action>

 

<follow action>

opacity not focus: 100%, 60

wait for opacity

show battle hud

</follow action>

 

<finish action>

clear battle log

perform finish

wait for movement

</finish action>

description: Monstre atack
name: Attaque
note:
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets true
perform start
wait for movement
motion attack: user
</setup action>
<Pre-Damage Eval>
if (user.isStateAffected(12)) {
  user.gainMp(-5);
}
</Pre-Damage Eval>
<Pre-Damage Eval>
if (user.isStateAffected(13)) {
  user.gainHp(-2);
}
</Pre-Damage Eval>

description: Monstre atack
name: Attaque
note:
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets true
perform start
wait for movement
motion attack: user
</setup action> 
<Pre-Damage Eval>
if (user.isStateAffected(12)) {
  user.gainMp(-5);
}
</Pre-Damage Eval>
<Pre-Damage Eval>
if (user.isStateAffected(13)) {
  user.gainHp(-2);
}
</Pre-Damage Eval>

description: Oblige les ennemis à vous attaquer.
name: Taunt

description:
Vous lancé un sort de vent très puissant sur un cible
Unique.
name: Ouragan
note:
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets true
perform start
wait for movement
cast Animation 123: user
ani wait: 20
</setup action>

description: une attaque qui charme l'ennemis
name: Charme

description:
Inflige des dommages de feu, si la cible meurt,
les MP sont récupérés.
name: Désintégrer
note:
<Post-Damage Eval>
if (target.hp <=0) {
  user.gainMp(item.mpCost);
}
</Post-Damage Eval>

description: Si l'ennemi visé attaque, il subit 2 points de dégâts.
name: Empathie

description: l'ennemi perd 5 points de mana dès qu'il attaque.
name: Chaine d'esprit

description:
Fait des dommages de feu sur chaque ennemies.
Chaque Hp perdu diminue le coup en MP de ce sort.
name: Molten Giant
note:
<Custom MP Cost>
cost -= user.mhp - user.hp
</Custom MP Cost>

name: Pour ORC
note:
<HP Cost: x%>
pour qu'il utilise des HP pour ses sorts !
